name: Death in Training
description:
The previous God of Death has suddenly disappeared. Because of this, instability has been brought upon the spirit realm, particularly in Limbo. Not knowing what is going on, you are brought to this room, full of undead spirits. Tasked with cleasing their souls, you must hold your ground as hundreds of spirits wreak havoc.

WASD to Move

Shift to Dash

Left Mouse to Shoot / Open Gateway Portals

Right Mouse to place Collected Souls

Dev Note: If you find any bugs. please report them to me!
